maqras.text: kadu, nenu i nagaram (makka) saksiga (antunnanu)
mariyu niku i nagaranlo (makkalo) sveccha undi
mariyu tandri (mulapurusudu) mariyu atani santanam saksiga
vastavaniki, memu manavunni sramajiviga puttincamu
emiti? Tananu evvadu vasaparacuko ledani atadu bhavistunnada
atadu: "Nenu viparita dhananni kharcu pettanu!" Ani antadu
emiti? Tananu evvadu cudatam ledani atadu bhavistunnada
emiti? Memu ataniki rendu kallu ivvaleda
Mariyu nalukanu mariyu rendu pedavulanu
mariyu ataniki (manci - cedu) ane spastamaina rendu margalanu cupamu
kani atadu kastataramaina urdhva gamananiki sahasincaledu
mariyu a urdhvagamanam ante emito niku telusa
adi okani medanu (banisatvam nundi) vidipincadam
leda! (Svayanga) akali goni unna roju kuda (itarulaku) annam pettadam
samipa anathuniki gani
leka, dikkuleni nirupedaku gani
mariyu visvasinci, sahananni bodhincevarilo! Mariyu karunanu okari kokaru bodhincukune varilo ceripovadam
ilanti vare kudipaksam varu
ika ma sandesalanu tiraskarincina varu, edama paksaniki cendinavaru
varini narakagni cuttukuntundi
suryuni mariyu dani enda saksiga
dani venuka vacce candruni saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
danini kram'mukune, ratri saksiga
akasam mariyu danini nirmincina ayana (allah) saksiga
bhumi mariyu danini vistarimpajesina ayana saksiga
manava atma mariyu danini tircididdina ayana saksiga
a taruvata ayane daniki dustatananni mariyu daivabhitini teliyajesadu
vastavaniki tana atmanu sud'dhaparacukunnavade saphaludavutadu
mariyu vastavaniki danini anaga drokkina vade viphaludavutadu
samud jati talabirusutananto (pravaktanu) asatyavadudavani tiraskarincindi; tamaloni parama dustudu (a duskaryam ceyataniki) lecinappudu
allah sandesaharudu (salih) varito: "I ada onte allah ku cendindi. Kabatti dinini (nillu) traganivvandi!" Ani annadu
ayina varu atani (salih) matanu abad'dhamani tiraskarincaru. Mariyu dani (a onte) venaka mokali naranni kosi, kuntidanni cesi camparu
Kabatti vari prabhuvu vari papaniki paryavasananga vari mida maha vipattunu pampi varandarini nasanam cesadu
mariyu ayana (allah) dani paryavasananni gurinci bhayapadaledu
kram'mukune ratri saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
mariyu, maga mariyu ada (jatulanu) srstincina ayana (allah) saksiga
vastavaniki, mi prayatnalu nana vidhaluga unnayi
kani evadaite (danadharmalu) cestu daivabhiti kaligi untado
mariyu mancini nam'mutado
ataniki memu melu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
kani evadaite pisinaritanam cestu, nirlaksya vaikharini avalambistado
mariyu mancini abad'dhamani tiraskaristado
ataniki memu cedu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
mariyu atadu nasinci poyinappudu, atani dhanam ataniki ela upayogapadutundi
niscayanga, sanmargam cupadam ma pani
mariyu niscayanga, ihaparalokala (adhipatyam) make cendinadi
kabatti nenu mim'malni prajvalince narakagnini gurinci heccarincanu
parama daurbhagyudu tappa, marevvadu andulo kaladu
evadaite (satyanni) tiraskarinci (dani nundi) vimukhudavutado
kani daivabhiti galavadu dani nundi (a narakagni nundi) duranga uncabadatadu
atade! Evadaite, pavitrudavataniki tana dhanam nundi (itarulaku) istado
kani adi, varu ataniki cesina e upakaraniki baduluga gaka
kevalam mahonnatudaina tana prabhuvu prasannatanu pondataniki matrame ayite
mariyu alanti vade tappaka santosistadu
prakasavantamaina prodduti puta (purvahnam) saksiga
mariyu cikati padda ratri saksiga
(o muham'mad!) Ni prabhuvu, ninnu tyajincanu ledu mariyu ninnu upeksincanu ledu
mariyu raboye kalam (jivitam) ni koraku modati kalam (jivitam) kante ento melainadi
Mariyu tvaralone ni prabhuvu niku (nivu koredi) prasadistadu. Danito nivu santosapadatavu
(o muham'mad!) Emi? Ninnu anathuniga cusi, ayana (allah) niku asrayam kalpincaleda
mariyu niku margam tocanappudu, ayana niku margadarsakatvam ceyaleda
mariyu ayana, pedavaniga cusi, ninnu sampannudiga ceyaleda
kabatti nivu anathula patla kathinanga pravartincaku
mariyu yacakunni kasarukoku
mariyu ni prabhuvu anugrahalanu bahiranganga prakatistu undu
